description: OPINION AND ORDER:#101166 The Court adopts in full the Report and Recommendation of Magistrate Judge Smith, and denies Petitioners application for a writ of habeas corpus pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 2254. As the petition makes no substantial showing  of the denial of a constitutional right, a certificate of appealability will not issue. 28 U.S.C. § 2253(c). The Court certifies that any appeal from this Order would not be taken in good faith.  (Signed by Judge Kimba M. Wood on 12/14/2011) (cd) Modified on 12/21/2011 (jab).
